modName: Better imperial armor by SteelSnake12 fix for Prometheus Imperial armor
descriptionHtml:
Adaptation of my mod Better imperial armor by SteelSnake12 for those who use Prometheus imperial armor mod.

Required:
-Better imperial armor by SteelSnake12 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50407/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50407&pUp=1

Installation:
1) install Better imperial armor by SteelSnake12 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50407/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50407&pUp=1
2) install fix

Changelog:
- Female and male heavy imperial armor and studded imperial armor correctly textures from my mod
- Change textures of cape. Trooper cape use 2048x2048 texture size now. Also dragon color is black now. Textures of heavy cape without dragon

Credits:
thanks PROMETHEUS_ts for original mods Prometheus Imperial trooper Chainmail and Prometheus Imperial Winter Heavy Armor
author: SteelSnake12
